original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.6. Hetuduka, Vitakkattika🔽Hetuṁ savitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Hetuṁ avitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  hetu duka vitakka ttika  hetum sa vitakka sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  hetum avitakka vicāra mattam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na avitakka vicāra mattaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ avitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum avitakka avicāram dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na avitakka avicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
